mapper.insert: insert into forum (emp_no, dept_no, forum_title, forum_text, forum_date, forum_notice, forum_files, forum_ofiles) values (#{empNo}, #{deptNo}, #{forumTitle}, #{forumText}, now(), #{forumNotice}, #{forumFiles}, #{forumOfiles})
mapper.update: update forum set forum_files = #{files} where forum_no = #{forumNo}
update forum set forum_count = forum_count+1 where forum_no = #{forumNo}
mapper.select: select * from forum where dept_no = #{deptno} order by forum_notice desc, forum_date desc limit 0, 3
